ModMetaData.name: [JDS] EFT Apparel
ModMetaData.author: JangoD'soul
ModMetaData.description:
[img]https://i.imgur.com/p7Fv1Z6.gif[/img] This mod adds Escape From Tarkov(EFT) apparel
[h1]Features:[/h1] -Adds 13 Headwear -Adds 45 Headgeaer -Adds 26 Chestrigs -Adds 20 Armorvest -Adds 18 Backpack
[url=https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1pMZNr-2rRlIZ7TqTyNbW66vV7Te7WVH_WKI2rXhyuzE/edit?usp=sharing] EFT Apparel Stats [/url]
[h1]recommend Mod:[/h1] [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1678847247] Graphics Settings - Fix your textures! [/url]
[h1]credits:[/h1]
-Battlestate Games - For the development of Escape from Tarkov
